title: Review: Redgrass RGG360° Definitive Edition: XL Caps Kickstarter
description:
Redgrass Creative has updated their popular RGG360° painting handle with new accessories. In this review, we'll take a look at the new swappable XL caps and pinning cork inserts, which will be realized through a Kickstarter starting in March.

The post Review: Redgrass RGG360° Definitive Edition: XL Caps Kickstarter appeared first on Tale of Painters.
